scripts.pretest: rm -f example/hopp.lock; rm -rf example/node_modules/hopp-preset-less; mkdir example/node_modules/hopp-preset-less; npm run test-copy
scripts.test-copy: for i in $(ls -1 | sed -E '/node_modules|example|index.src.js|LICENSE|README.md/d'); do cp -vR $i example/node_modules/hopp-preset-less/; done
